en.subject: Sprint Course Invitation
en.body:
I hope you're doing well and that everything is going smoothly. We are about to start this 'Sprint Course'an 8-week online program focused on Household Articles.

This course is designed for all levels participating in English Connect.

Update your schedule. Even if you can't fully commit, the purpose is not only to learn English but to have an uplifting experience that inspires love and hope through the environment I aim to create for you.

Schedule:
    04:30 pm 吼 (Rexburg)
    05:30 pm  葛  仇 拆
    06:30 pm 叼  
    07:30 pm 火 ю
    08:30 pm  ю 吼  叼
    12 am 

If you'd like prepare yourself more and you have not watched the intro videos to learn more about this experience, here are some videos I made:
    General Overview:
        Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/share/v/1PvwiQxejc/
        YouTube: https://youtu.be/GMDWc83Qmrc

    Introduction to the Website:
        Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/share/v/19YpgdCcPT/
        YouTube: https://youtu.be/5aXoiNEkuWA

Warm regards to {{location}}, Brother Arellano.

es.subject: Invitaci贸n al Sprint Course
es.body:
Espero que est茅 bien y que las cosas est茅n marchando. Perm铆tame, estamos por empezar este 'Sprint Course'un programa online de 8 semanas enfocado en Art铆culos del Hogar.

Este curso est谩 dise帽ado para todos los niveles que participan en English Connect.

Actualice su horario. Incluso si no puede comprometerse por completo, el prop贸sito no es solo aprender ingl茅s, sino tener una experiencia que nos inspire amor y esperanza a trav茅s del ambiente que buscar茅 crear para usted.

Horario:
    04:30 pm 吼 (Rexburg)
    05:30 pm  葛  仇 拆
    06:30 pm 叼  
    07:30 pm 火 ю
    08:30 pm  ю 吼  叼
    12 am 

Si desea prepararse mejor para esta esta experiencia, aqu铆 le paso unos videos que yo mismo hice:
    Visi贸n General:
        Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/share/v/1PvwiQxejc/

    Introducci贸n al Sitio Web:
        Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/share/v/19YpgdCcPT/

Un abrazo fuert铆simo hasta {{location}}, Hno Arellano.

If it helps you, feel free to give it a heart or a thumbs up, or even share it if it was worthwhile.

en.subject: Catch up Week - Titulino Household Part 1
en.body:
{{association}} {{name}} This Monday Feb 17 will not have an official class, rather we will do catch up, so rather than having a class we will meet for 60 min to play blooket and have an informal personal insight, hope you can join us, I would love to see you with us no matter how much you have been able to be part if it, come!.

Don't forget to register your progress in case you want to apply for a certificate: https://titulino.com/lrn/eng/level-household/resources/my-progress  

Important Links:  

General Gathering: https://titulino.com/lrn/eng/level-household/chapter-1/class  

Basic Grammar Playlist on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/share/v/NTWs7LP4yQ8xDGzQ/  
Basic Grammar Playlist on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLkmoSkwe5lUCYjyyxkchTZeXW1sIHzuoT  

Would you like to sponsor or support this project? You can buy a pizza: https://buymeacoffee.com/titulino  

One more thing: May God take care of our minds and hearts.
Warm regards to {{location}}, Brother Arellano.

es.subject: Semana de recuperacion (Catch-up week) Titulino Household Part 1
es.body:
{{association}} {{name}} Este lunes 17 de febrero no tendremos una clase oficial, m谩s bien nos pondremos al d铆a, as铆 que en lugar de tener una clase nos reuniremos durante 60 minutos para jugar al blooket y tener una visi贸n personal informal, espero que puedas unirte a nosotros, me encantar铆a verte con nosotros sin importar cu谩nto hayas podido ser parte, 隆ven!.

No olvides registrar tu progreso en caso de que quieras solicitar un certificado: https://titulino.com/lrn/eng/level-household/resources/my-progress 

Enlaces importantes: 

Reuni贸n general: https://titulino.com/lrn/eng/level-household/chapter-1/class 

Lista de reproducci贸n de gram谩tica b谩sica en Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/share/v/NTWs7LP4yQ8xDGzQ/ 
Lista de reproducci贸n de gram谩tica b谩sica en YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLkmoSkwe5lUCYjyyxkchTZeXW1sIHzuoT 

驴Te gustar铆a patrocinar o apoyar este proyecto? Puedes comprar una pizza: https://buymeacoffee.com/titulino 

Una cosa m谩s: que Dios cuide nuestras mentes y corazones.
Un cordial saludo. {{ubicaci贸n}}, Hermano Arellano.
